thread.title: Sen. Cruz brings presidential campaign to Kalamazoo
thread.title_full: Sen. Cruz brings presidential campaign to Kalamazoo

author: detroitnews.com
title: Sen. Cruz brings presidential campaign to Kalamazoo
text:
U.S. Sen. Ted Cruz (Photo: Getty Images) 
14 CONNECT 10 TWEET 1 LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE U.S. Sen. Ted Cruz of Texas is speaking to supporters of his campaign for the Republican nomination for president during a Monday morning rally in Kalamazoo.
Cruz is speaking inside Kalamazoo’s Wings Event Center. The event will mark Cruz’s third campaign visit to Michigan and his second in the past month.
Tweets by @ChadLivengood The junior senator from Texas was a keynote speaker Sept. 19 at the Michigan Republican Party’s biennial leadership conference on Mackinac Island.
In June, Cruz spoke in Howell at a fundraiser for the Livingston County Republican Party.
For Cruz’s Monday morning rally, doors open at 8:30 a.m. to the general public. The event is scheduled to begin at 9 a.m.
Cruz is one of 15 candidates seeking the Republican nomination for president in 2016. He ranks sixth in RealClearPolitics.com’s average of national polls and fourth in a rolling average of polls in Iowa , which will hold its first-in-the-nation caucuses on Feb. 1.
